channel.title: CIS 300 Section B Syllabus - Fall 2024 :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Content in this syllabus is subject to change Link to this Syllabus Previous Versions CIS 300 Fall 2024 Meets MWF 11:30am-1:20pm Contact Info ALL course help/assistance emails (especially for labs, homework, and quizzes) should be sent cis300help@KSUemailProd.onmicrosoft.com. This email will contact the instructor and all TA(s) for the course. Please allow one full business day for email responses. Questions regarding your grade on an assignment should be emailed directly to the person who assigned that grade.
